com.apple.mrj.jdirect
Class PointerStruct

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.apple.mrj.jdirect.Struct
        |
        +--com.apple.mrj.jdirect.PointerStruct
public abstract class PointerStruct
extends Struct

PointerStruct is the base class for Struct classes which store their C structs as MacOS non-relocatable heap blocks (e.g. WindowPtr). When constructed, PointerStruct is given the MacOS memory pointer.

Field Summary
protected  int pointer
          The data for these Structs in store in the MacOS heap.

          Construct a PointerStruct which wraps a C non-relocatable struct

Field Detail

pointer

protected int pointer
The data for these Structs in store in the MacOS heap. This int holds the MacOS pointer to the C struct.
